text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom sthet now leu phosdo tang da chbasaleasa pi mcheasa robsakhnhom te puok anak ban bdeseth nung vea . khnhom poum mean avei del puok anak kampoung tkkrahl nung vea ( tearounakamm) noh laey . kar sa me r ch chbab teangoasa ku sthetnow leu a l laoh del trong banhcheak yeang chbasa nouv karpit . haey trong kuchea anak vinichchhy da brasaer bamphot
